TopicTitle: Horrible Performance Hardly Utilizing Cores with Multiple Craft Spawned

Articles.Content:
Version: KSP 1.10.1 Windows 64-bit

Problem: KSP gets 10 FPS on a high-end 8-core Ryzen 9 4900HS when running a 2v2 BDA dogfight. Issue is that it hardly utilizes any cores, hardly any of my GPU, or anything. The screenshot attached was taken during a 2v2 dogfight.  CPU and GPU barely get hot. None of the threads are being utilized to their fullest. The KSP Task is set to the highest priority. 

Mods Installed: - BD Armory
